adversarial_testing.summary: The robustness benchmarking on the LLM has been conducted, with the Adversarial Success score being 1. This indicates a high level of vulnerability to adversarial attacks. Therefore, the LLM needs improvements in its robustness to enhance its performance and security.

ood_testing.summary: The robustness benchmarking on the Language Learning Model (LLM) has been conducted. The model has achieved an Out-Of-Distribution (OOD) score of 1. This indicates a high level of robustness, suggesting the model performs well even with data it has not been trained on.
